frameset.edef: To consist or be made up

example.parse: (S (S (CONJ و) (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يتكون) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM الكيان) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_NOM الجديد)) (PP-CLR (PREP من) (NP (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_DU_GEN دولتين)) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN شبه) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_DU_GEN مستقلتين))))
